title: The developer shall have to pay as an unearned income equal to 40% of difference of sale value of shifted built up area of Permanent Transit Camp component as per ASR
clause_text: The developer shall have to pay as an unearned income equal to 40% of difference of sale value of shifted built up area of Permanent Transit Camp component as per ASR .
section: 33(11)Provisions relating to Permanent Transit Camp tenements for Slum Rehabilitation Scheme:

source_pdf.text_snippet: The developer shall have to pay as an unearned income equal to 40% of difference of sale value of shifted built up area of Permanent Transit Camp component as per ASR .
